description: Organism component: Global website header containing branding, navigation menu, and utility controls. One per site configuration.

fields.name: Internal Name

validations.message: Each header must have a unique name

fields.helpText: Unique identifier for this header configuration (e.g., 'Main Header', 'Campaign Header')

fields.name: Brand URL (Logo Link)
fields.helpText: URL when logo is clicked. Typically the homepage (e.g., '/' or 'https://www.yoursite.com')

fields.name: Brand Logo

validations.message: Logo must be an image file
Logo should be max 400x100px for optimal header display

fields.helpText: Company logo. Recommended: SVG or PNG with transparent background, max 400x100px

fields.name: Main Navigation Menu

validations.message: Add 1-8 main menu items for optimal navigation

fields.helpText: Primary navigation links. Keep to 5-8 items max for clean design. Use Menu Item content type

fields.name: Top Bar Links (Utility)
fields.helpText: Optional secondary links above main nav (e.g., 'Login', 'Contact', 'Support'). Max 5 items

fields.name: Enable Search Bar
fields.helpText: Toggle to show/hide the search functionality in the header

fields.name: Enable Shopping Cart
fields.helpText: Toggle to show/hide the shopping cart icon and pop-up basket functionality

fields.name: Sticky Announcement Bar

validations.message: Only bold and italic formatting allowed for clean display
Only plain text with hyperlinks allowed. No headings or lists

fields.helpText: Optional announcement bar above header (e.g., 'Free shipping on orders over $50'). Keep brief
